description: Great IDEA to make an easy tool but more work needed to actually make it work. A use r of this would expect that is you install the app and start it, that some one can connect. Specially if you wnet through the trouble of fiddling with the fire wall (something that should be done automatically). However, it was not possible to connect with either VNC or remmina. It is really necessary to get the details right when making an app; satisfy deppendencies, confiure services... etc. This app provides no utility for a regular user.
Easy, for non technical people. works fine for remote support
summary: Easy, for non technical people. works fine for remote support
